field_descriptions.define: Define an asset for the stablecoin. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.expire: Record the exchange rate on the expiry date. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.add_collateral: Add collateral to a loan. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.repay: Repay a loan. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.seize: Seize an undercollateralized loan. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.end_auction: End an auction. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Withdraw funds remaining after losing an auction. Set the value to 1.
field_descriptions.to: Address to withdraw to after losing an auction.
field_descriptions.amount: Amount to withdraw after losing an auction.
